content:
Call for Implementer Topic Presenters

Are you a part of the C-CDA implementer community who is interested in presenting on a problem C-CDA implementers are experiencing today AND willing to propose a potential solution or a set of options the implementer community could consider which would improve the situation?

Sign up before June 15, 2020 to play a critical role in the next virtual C-CDA IAT.

https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IAT/2020.07.22+Virtual+IAT+Track+Agenda
Is there a registration fee for participation?

The Registration Fee for the July 29 2020 C-CDA IAT is $99.00 for HL7 Members

Registration is open now: http://www.hl7.org/events/index.cfm?showallevents&ref=nav

Zoom Into the C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon July 29th, 2020

Register today! http://www.hl7.org/events/c-cda/implementation/2020/07/

If you or your customers use HL7 C-CDA documents to exchange data, you won’t want to miss the upcoming virtual C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon, Wednesday, July 29th from 10am – 6pm ET.

This virtual event promises to be packed with useful information you need to manage your product roadmap for C-CDA support. We’ll be covering some of today’s most urgent implementer needs. Topics will be presented by C-CDA implementers including: Allscripts, Cerner, the CommonWell/CareQuality communities, Diameter Health, Optum, and others.

Attend the July 29th C-CDA IAT and you will:
• Learn how to document of death, death reason and birth/pregnancy
• Get the latest on representing a patient’s health insurance information in the Payer section
• Hear about a new identifier extension for CDA R2.0 that aligns with identifiers used in FHIR
• Stay abreast of what the CommonWell/Carequality community is doing to advance sharing of C-CDA Encounter Summaries and Patient Summaries
• See how USCI Clinical Notes, annotated comments and unstructured documents are being used to expand information exchange via C-CDA
• Clarify how to USCDI information maps from C-CDA templates to FHIR profiles and the FHIR Provenance Resource
• Discover how illustrative use cases can be used to accelerate interoperability for C-CDA documents
Check out the full agenda: 2020.07.29 Virtual IAT Track Agenda
Register today! http://www.hl7.org/events/c-cda/implementation/2020/07/
VIRTUAL EVENT!! $99 for HL7 members ($199 for non-members)
Questions? Contact Lisa Nelson (Lnelson@max.md)
@Lisa Nelson Would it b recorded for people who register but cant make it.

@Tushar Nair We'll miss your input and participation. The real power of the C-CDA IAT is community participation in the discussions. However, we do record the topic presentations for others to reference if needed. I'll post information about the recordings once we have them available.

Get ready for a GREAT EVENT!!!! The July 2020 C-CDA Implementation-A-Thon is about to begin at 10:00 AM this morning.

Stay tuned for real-time posting from the event.

Less than ten minutes left! You can view the full agenda and download available note pages and background information from the Confluence page: here https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IAT/2020.07.29+Virtual+IAT+Track+Agenda
Opening remarks by Jean Duteau starting now! https://www.linkedin.com/in/jean-henri-duteau-02630648/
